      • generateKeys

        public java.security.KeyPair generateKeys​(java.lang.String secretPhrase)
        Generate deterministic ECC key pair using defaultCurve and passphrase. Well, obiously all the security depends on randomness of passphrase!
        Parameters:
        secretPhrase - long enough and random enough pass phrase. You've been warned!
        Returns:
        EEC key pair
